articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Going to Qatar for the World Cup? Keep in mind these laws and customs - The Indian Express
articles.description: Fans attending the World Cup should be mindful of Qatar’s laws and cultural customs, including policies for alcohol, drugs, sexuality and dress code. Here's a look at the some of them.
articles.content: Over a million sports fans will go to Qatar for the World Cup in November and December, a spectacle that typically turns host countries into a nonstop party. But this year may be different. The tiny,… [+4401 chars]
